actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: To reaffirm the commitment of the United States to help Guam achieve full self-governance, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that Congress: (1) recognizes its duty under the Constitution to promote the political development and advancement of Guam; (2) reaffirms its commitment to help Guam achieve full self-governance; (3) aspires to eradicate colonialism and grant the Chamorro people of Guam the right to self-determination by 2010; (4) continues to support and respect human rights; and (5) urges the President to also reaffirm the U.S. commitment to help Guam achieve full self- governance and to grant the Chamorro people of Guam the right to self-determination by 2010.

titles.title: To reaffirm the commitment of the United States to help Guam achieve full self-governance, and for other purposes.
